channel.title: Shoulder Bag – Shreem Enterprises
channel.description: Aesthetic & Ethnic Look for you and your Home.

item.title: Women embriodered Off White creamcolour crossbody Shoulder bag
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Women Hand embriodered- Off White cream colour -Everyday Shoulder bag Peacock embroidered
item.content:encoded:
Women embriodered Everyday crossbody Shoulder bag .

Material: Cotton Fabric. Zipper Closure. Hand embridered .

Practical Design with plenty of room for your cell phone, Wallet, Books, Makeup accesories and so on.

Note: We do our best to ensure that our photos are as true to color as possible. However, due to inconsistencies monitors, digital photography and production variations, we cannot guarantee that the color you see on This can be carries for travel, work, shopping, holidays.it walks you everywhere.Long straps. Excellent gift for friends , family , birthdays etc.

Note: Colour may slightly vary.

item.title: Multi colour Shoulder bag with bells- Rectangle shape- Color: Maroon
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hand Embrioidered - multi colour- Everyday Crossbody Shoulder bag with bells. Color: Maroon(mix of red and brown)
item.content:encoded: Hand Embrioidered multi colour. Bag Color: Maroon Everyday Crossbody Shoulder bag with bells. Material: Cotton Fabric. Zipper closure. Shape: Rectangle. Broad sturdy staps. Attactive looking bag with multi colour and Elephant hand embroidered on the front. Cute looking bag can be carried anywhere you go! Practical design to keep Wallet, books, cell phone, makeup accessories , i pad etc. Note: We do our best to ensure that our photos are as true to color as possible. However, due to inconsistencies monitors, digital photography and production variations, we cannot guarantee that the color you see on your screen accurately portrays the true color of the product.
